# Giridhar Villiambakkam Chakravarthi

## About
Product builder with 10+ years across product management (6 years) and engineering with a focus on developer ecosystems. High agency leader driven by customer focus, empathy and bias toward action.

## Current Role
- Senior Product Manager at Postman (Jan 2021 — Present)
- Building the best-in-class API Client: advanced scripting, seamless API authorizations, multi-protocol support
- Key wins: Package Library & NPM support (20% workflow adoption), BYOK encryption (~$10M ARR unblocked), Scratchpad sunsetting (double-digit growth in sign-ups/WAU)

## Previous Experience
- Zoho Corporation (May 2013 — Dec 2020)
  - Founding PM for Catalyst, a serverless developer platform (TechCrunch coverage)
  - Built Zoho Apptics, a privacy-first mobile analytics tool (adopted across 40+ Zoho apps)

## Skills
- Product management, developer ecosystems, API platforms, enterprise security
- GTM execution, cross-functional leadership, growth experimentation
- Engineering background (Information Technology, B.Tech)

## Education
- B.Tech, Information Technology — Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology (2009–2013)
